Deficiency Narrative: It was observed during the inspection that fire inspection expired on 10/06/2024.
Correction Narrative: Fire inspection was completed and was passed as of 11/27/2024.

Deficiency Narrative: Staff file reviewed did not have an updated copy of the normalcy training.
Correction Narrative:
748.867(b)(3) A caregiver/employee is exempt from completing 2 hrs of normalcy training if the caregiver/employee can document that the training was received. (Weight: Medium Low)
	Staff file reviewed did not have an updated copy of the normalcy training.	The normalcy for Angelina was in her file. It was just overlooked and I sent it immediately at 3:21 pm to the license representative. Im also attaching a copy for corrective action.

Correction Narrative:
Administrator to ensure that training is filed into the personnel files within 24 hours after training is completed.

Attached are the training and certificates for the 5 staff members. (document library)

Deficiency Narrative: One of the four child's file reviewed was missing the required signature for child's rights on file.
Correction Narrative: Case Manger to ensure that required  documents are received from case workers in a timely manner and filed in the children files. There was an email requesting the child right signed paperwork from case worker but was never followed up to ensure KH received it. Attached is the signed document (childs right)

Deficiency Narrative: Two of the service plans reviewed were not signed by any of the participating parties.
Correction Narrative: Follow-up was conducted by inspection. Administrator provided a copy of the initial service plan with a signature of one Kidz Harbor staff. The operation will ensure all appropriate signatures are completed in future service plans.

Deficiency Narrative: Staff are saying harsh, cruel demeaning things to children in care which include speaking of their future negatively.
In reviewing medication administration records. Three of four records reviewed show the staff who administered medication have their initials instead of their full names listed on the log.
Correction Narrative: A new form was completed with a space for printed names and will be used moving forward. The form was emailed and is located in client files.
